original_text: And the Lord was gracious unto them, and had compassion on them, and had respect unto them, because of his covenant with Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, and would not destroy them, neither cast he them from his presence as yet.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱과 더불어 세우신 언약 때문에 이스라엘에게 은혜를 베풀며 그들을 불쌍히 여기시며 돌보사 멸하기를 즐겨하지 아니하시고 이 때까지 자기 앞에서 쫓아내지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord was gracious unto them
because of his covenant with Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱과의 언약 때문이었으며

sentences.original_text: neither cast he them from his presence as yet
sentences.korean_translation: 아직 그들을 자기 앞에서 쫓아내지 아니하셨음이라
